Larry Sabato said the Republican takeover of the House of Representatives gives the Bill Clinton a new political lease on life. 2011 2:52 PM DALLAS( AP)-- NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell is not concerned about Michael Vick being billed as hosting a Super Bowl party because the Eagles quarterback told him it's not true. He has said that on numerous occasions people have been using his name about being involved in some type of a party and he had no intention of participating in that, Roger Goodell said.
